abstract: Ford Motor Co reports 2014 profit of $3.19 billion, down 56 percent from 2013 profit of $7.18 billion; revenue fell 2 percent; reports fourth-quarter profit of $52 million, down from $3.07 billion in year-ago quarter; new-model rollouts and other costs hurt profit.
lead_paragraph: International costs and new-model introductions were challenging for the automaker, which said it expected stronger results this year.
snippet: International costs and new-model introductions were challenging for the automaker, which said it expected stronger results this year.

headline.main: Ford Earnings Plummet, Weighed by Expenses
headline.print_headline: Ford Earnings Plummet, Weighed by Expenses
